name: Linux man-pages Copyleft
body:

The author(s)not have taken the same level of care in the production ofmanual, which is licensed free of charge, as they might whenprofessionally.

Formatted or processed versions of this manual, if unaccompanied by the source, must acknowledge the copyright and authors of this work.
